_create_table_channels_: CREATE TABLE channels (channel_id int IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY, channel_name varchar(500), url varchar(1000), mod_ts datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
_create_table_channelname_: CREATE TABLE _channelname__channel (channel_id int FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES channels(channel_id), vid_id int IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY, vid_title varchar(1000), yt_id varchar(20), yt_url varchar(200), vid_release_ts datetime, mod_ts datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
_create_table_channel_transcript_: CREATE TABLE _channelname__transcript (channel_id int FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES channels(channel_id), vid_id int FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES _channelname__channel(vid_id), transcript_id int IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY, st varchar(50), en varchar(50), txt varchar(10000), json nvarchar(max), mod_ts datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
